Package edu.guilford

Class MeatEater

java.lang.Object
edu.guilford.Creature
edu.guilford.Critter
edu.guilford.MeatEater
public class MeatEater extends Critter
A class that represents a meat eater object in the simulation

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class edu.guilford.Critter

    foodEaten

    Fields inherited from class edu.guilford.Creature

    age, alive, rate, size

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MeatEater(float size, float rate, float foodNeed)
    A constructor that initializes a meat eater object with a size, growth rate, and amount of food needed; foodEaten will be set to zero

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    simulateDay()
    A method that simulates a day in the life of the meat eater; along with adding onto the simulateDay method in the Critter class, the meat eater object can chase and eat one or two plant eater objects a day, causing the plant eater to die.

    Methods inherited from class edu.guilford.Critter

    eat, getFoodNeed, setFoodNeed, stillNeed

    Methods inherited from class edu.guilford.Creature

    changeSize, die, getAge, getRate, getSize, isAlive, setRate

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MeatEater

      public MeatEater(float size, float rate, float foodNeed)
      A constructor that initializes a meat eater object with a size, growth rate, and amount of food needed; foodEaten will be set to zero
      Parameters:
      size - the initial size of the object (in g)
      rate - the initial rate of growth of the object (in g/day)
      foodNeed - the amount of food the object needs each day (in g)

  • Method Details

    • simulateDay

      public void simulateDay()
      A method that simulates a day in the life of the meat eater; along with adding onto the simulateDay method in the Critter class, the meat eater object can chase and eat one or two plant eater objects a day, causing the plant eater to die.
      Overrides:
      simulateDay in class Critter
